name: Mining Robot
description: Basic autonomous miner. Your first step into the belt. Best on rocky terrain.

name: Drill Mk.I
description: Improved extraction head. Cuts through surface rock in seconds.

name: Solar Collector
description: Converts sunlight into mining power. Most effective on sun-baked desert worlds.

name: Drill Mk.II
description: Heavy-duty surface drill. Built for long shifts in the void. Requires trained crew.

name: Cryo Extractor
description: Harvests ices and frozen volatiles. Thrives on ice planets.

name: Asteroid Rig
description: Full mining platform. Drills, crushes, and sorts in one unit. Needs a team.

name: Magma Pump
description: Taps molten ore from lava flows. Built for volcanic worlds.

name: Orbital Station
description: Refinery and logistics hub. The heart of your operation. Crew-intensive.

name: Gas Siphon
description: Extracts valuable gases from atmospheres. Best on gas giants.

name: Deep Core Drill
description: Penetrates dense ore layers. Reaches what others can't. Requires specialist crew.

name: Geo Drill
description: Optimized for solid rock and metal-rich crust. Most effective on rocky planets.

name: Stellar Harvester
description: Harvests rare minerals at scale. Feeds the entire sector.

name: Quantum Extractor
description: Maximum efficiency extraction. Near-instant ore processing. Needs expert crew.

name: Void Crusher
description: Pulverizes asteroid cores. Built for the endgame.

name: Nexus Collector
description: Harvests from multiple dimensions. The ultimate module. Full crew required.
